name: Alex Thompson
description: Alex represents a leading national tutoring provider with extensive experience in scaling high-quality tutoring programs. They bring practical insights from working directly with students and educators.

name: Maria Garcia
description: Maria leads a community-based tutoring organization focused on serving underserved populations. Her organization has developed innovative models for personalized learning support.

name: David Park
description: David is the founder of an EdTech tutoring platform that combines AI with human tutors. His platform has served thousands of students and provides valuable insights into technology-enhanced tutoring.
